description: This Kotlin source file defines a Fragment named WebDemoFragment for an Android application. It manages a WebView component to load local HTML assets, with configurations for JavaScript and DOM storage.

classes.name: WebDemoFragment
classes.description: Fragment that loads a WebView displaying local HTML content with JavaScript and DOM storage enabled.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of WebDemoFragment.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes the WebView, sets its settings, assigns a WebViewClient, and loads a local HTML page.

methods.name: onDestroyView
methods.description: Destroys the WebView and performs cleanup when the view is destroyed.
